2072.subject: HPWE
2072.course_title_long: Phys Ed for Elem Sch Child Lab
2072.descrlong: 32 hours of contact with preschool and elementary school children, focusing on the neurological foundations for movement for all children from a growth and development perspective.  Emphasizes physical activity and programmatic organization in the gymnasium and on the playground as it relates to problem solving and academic success; multicultural approaches to movement, moral development, and self image; movement exploration, body/spatial awareness; and non-locomotor skills.  (Offered online in spring of even years. Classroom course offered every semester.)
